## Glossary
break-even: having income exactly equal to expediture, thus showing neither profit nor loss.

Break-even percentage: is the number of trades you need to win to break even. It's used to determine whether your trading system provides enough winning trades to be profitable. 
$$ \frac{stopLoss}{target + stopLoss}*100\% $$
